name: hubot-pull-request
description: A hubot script that handles merge requests (Gitlab) and pull requests (Github).

scripts.test-cov: node_modules/.bin/mocha test/**/*.test.coffee -t 10000 --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require blanket --reporter html-cov > tmp/coverage.html
scripts.grep-cov: cat tmp/coverage.html | egrep -o '<div class="percentage">[^<]+' | egrep -o '\d+' | head -n 1
scripts.get-cov: npm run test-cov && npm run grep-cov
scripts.watch: fswatch src:test 'clear && npm test && npm run get-cov'

author: Sascha Depold
